Title: Markes permanent certain provisions of law relating to catastrophic or reinsurance coverage issued to certain small groups
Summary: Makes permanent certain provisions of law relating to catastrophic or reinsurance coverage issued to certain small groups.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, Chap 589 of 2015; amd ยง5, Chap 588 of 2015
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 589 of the laws of 2015, amending the insurance law relating to catastrophic or reinsurance coverage issued to certain small groups, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and to amend chapter 588 of the laws of 2015, amending the insurance law relating to catastrophic or reinsurance coverage issued to certain small groups, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
